Package edu.kit.ipd.sdq.kamp4attack.core.changepropagation.attackhandlers

Class AttackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.ipd.sdq.kamp4attack.core.changepropagation.attackhandlers.AttackHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssemblyContextHandler, LinkingResourceHandler, MethodHandler, ResourceContainerHandler
    public abstract class AttackHandler
extends Object
    Generic class for handling attacks on system entities. Provides useful helper methods for concrete subclasses

      • queryAccessForEntity

        protected Optional<PDPResult> queryAccessForEntity​(org.palladiosimulator.pcm.core.entity.Entity target,
                                                   List<? extends org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.context.system.UsageSpecification> credentials,
                                                   org.palladiosimulator.pcm.repository.Signature signature)
        Sends an access request to the policy decision point (PDP).
        Important: before the request the PDP must be initialised. This can be done with Evaluate.initialize(String)
        Parameters:
        target - requested system entity
        credentials - current credentials
        Returns:
        See Also:
        Evaluate.initialize(String)

      • checkVulnerability

        protected org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Vulnerability checkVulnerability​(org.palladiosimulator.pcm.core.entity.Entity entity,
                                                                                                                               CredentialChange change,
                                                                                                                               List<org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.context.system.UsageSpecification> credentials,
                                                                                                                               List<org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Attack> attacks,
                                                                                                                               List<org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Vulnerability> vulnerabilityList,
                                                                                                                               org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.AttackVector attackVector)
        Checks whether the current vulnerabilities of a system entity (e.g. AssemblyContext, ResourceContainers ...) can be exploited by the capabilities of an attacker. It thereby considers the authorisation and the actual attack capabilities of the attacker
        Parameters:
        entity - attacked system entity
        change - container with compromised entities
        credentials - credentials of the attacker
        attacks - attacks of the attacker
        vulnerabilityList - Vulnerabilities of the system entity
        attackVector - attack vector of the attacker
        Returns:
        the vulnerability with the highest ConfidentialityImpact for the system entity

      • checkVulnerability

        protected org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Vulnerability checkVulnerability​(CredentialChange change,
                                                                                                                               List<org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Attack> attacks,
                                                                                                                               List<org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.Vulnerability> vulnerabilityList,
                                                                                                                               org.palladiosimulator.pcm.confidentiality.attackerSpecification.attackSpecification.AttackVector attackVector,
                                                                                                                               Optional<PDPResult> result)
        Checks whether the current vulnerabilities of a system entity (e.g. AssemblyContext, ResourceContainers ...) can be exploited by the capabilities of an attacker. It thereby considers the authorisation and the actual attack capabilities of the attacker
        Parameters:
        change - container with compromised entities
        credentials - credentials of the attacker
        attacks - attacks of the attacker
        vulnerabilityList - Vulnerabilities of the system entity
        attackVector - attack vector of the attacker
        Returns:
        the vulnerability with the highest ConfidentialityImpact for the system entity
